title: Oneiro: in the shadow of Isadora [NTSC]
creator_credit: Silvianna Goldsmith and Montclair State College
brief_description: Dance poem in three sections performed by Lori Belilove based on Belilove’s own choreography and improvisation as inspired by Isadora Duncan. Using special effects and computerized image processing, the dance sequences are superimposed onto images of ancient Greek temples, paintings, sculptures, and the Aegean Isles.
